Polyprolic acids

monoprollc acids. Certain types of polyprotlc acids have more specific names, such as diprotlc acid (two 
potential hydrogen ions to donate) and triprotic acid (three potential hydrogen Ions to donate).

Polyprolic acids

monoprollc acids. Certain types of polyprotlc acids have more specific names, such as diprotlc acid (two 
potential hydrogen ions to donate) and triprotic acid (three potential hydrogen Ions to donate).

Polyprolic acids

monoprollc acids. Certain types of polyprotlc acids have more specific names, such as diprotlc acid (two 
potential hydrogen ions to donate) and triprotic acid (three potential hydrogen Ions to donate).
